definition: abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]

sentences.english: Ji Shengzi was celebrated for training fighting cock.
sentences.chinese: 纪渻子是有名的斗鸡训练师。

sentences.english: Several boys try to catch a glimpse of a cockfight in the tannery section of the slums.
sentences.chinese: 几个男孩正设法在贫民窟制革作坊里看斗鸡。

sentences.english: The grass skiing area was next to the cock fighting place.
sentences.chinese: 斗鸡场的旁边就是滑草场。

sentences.english: In North Viet Nam, the government allow people to hold cockfighting event to celebrate the New Year.
sentences.chinese: 在越南北部，政府允许人们举办斗鸡比赛来庆祝新年。

sentences.english: Game birds are very cannibalistic under any circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 斗鸡在任何情况下都是非常残忍的。

sentences.english: People were fighting like gamecocks against adversity.
sentences.chinese: 一直都象斗鸡一样地和艰难困苦奋斗的人。

sentences.english: Send a new post about cockfighting in English.
The breed hasn't changed very much for over a thousand years.
sentences.chinese: 它是古代斗鸡的后代，在过去一千年里，改变了很多。

sentences.english: There is the professional cockfighting website.
The first show was Python cockfighting.
sentences.chinese: 第一个表演是蟒蛇斗鸡。

sentences.english: His watery crossed eyes rolled in exaltation .
sentences.chinese: 他得意洋洋地转动着水汪汪的斗鸡眼。

sentences.english: He does not have a cock-eye, but his actions are cock-eyed .
sentences.chinese: 他没有斗鸡眼，不过，他的行动却是愚昧的。

sentences.english: Cockscomb country is a god with chicken, but cockfighting always be defeated in big Long Guojin gallinaceous foot falls.
sentences.chinese: 鸡冠国以鸡为神，但斗鸡总败在大龙国金鸡脚下。
他剪去斗鸡的鸡冠和鸡垂。

sentences.english: The cockfights, instituted by the mayor himself, were suspended.
sentences.chinese: 镇长本人鼓励的斗鸡停止了。

sentences.english: Banna gamecock is one of the famous cockfighting breed in China.
sentences.chinese: 版纳斗鸡是我国著名的斗鸡品种之一。

definition: see 鬥雞眼|斗鸡眼[dou4 ji1 yan3]
to get a monkey to perform tricks/to put on a monkey show/to make fun of sb/to tease
tortoise/cuckold/(old) male owner of a brothel/pimp
